com.stripe.android.view

Interface CardValidCallback


  • public CardValidCallback

    An interface for a callback object that will be called when the user's input changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardValidCallback

        public CardValidCallback()

    • Method Detail

      • onInputChanged

        void onInputChanged(boolean isValid,
                    @NotNull
                    java.util.Set<? extends com.stripe.android.view.CardValidCallback.Fields> invalidFields)
        Parameters:
        isValid - if the current input is valid
        invalidFields - if the current input is invalid, this Set will be populated with thefields that are invalid, represented by enum CardValidCallback.Fields; if the current input is valid,this Set will be empty
